description: Financial anomaly and structural integrity signals used by STA for Due Diligence.

signal_types.description: Balance sheet equation fails: Assets are not equal to Equity plus Liabilities.
Equity roll-forward fails: Opening equity plus profit minus dividends and movements does not equal closing equity.
Dividend appears structurally impossible relative to equity capacity.
Income statement result does not reconcile with balance sheet movement.
Cash flow statement does not reconcile with change in cash position.
Large write-down appears without structural cause in surrounding financial statements.
Intercompany balances move significantly without matching explanation.
Large credit-like effect appears without traceable debit counterpart.
A financial line normally requiring note disclosure lacks supporting information.
Mapping from source financial statement to STA model has low confidence.
